name: D-ID
description: D-ID is an AI-powered platform for creating realistic video avatars and conversational agents to enhance digital communication.
longDescription: D-ID is a leading generative AI platform specializing in transforming still images into dynamic, lifelike video avatars and real-time conversational AI agents. Founded in 2017, its mission is to humanize digital interactions by replacing traditional graphical user interfaces (GUI) with natural user interfaces (NUI), enabling intuitive, face-to-face communication without typing or clicking. The platform serves businesses in marketing, sales, customer experience, and e-learning by offering tools to create engaging, multilingual video content and interactive digital humans. With over 250 million videos generated and a robust API used by 280,000+ developers, D-ID integrates seamlessly with platforms like Microsoft Teams, Canva, and Google Slides. Its technology also supports accessibility, such as real-time sign language translation and communication solutions for individuals with conditions like ALS, restoring their ability to engage naturally.
features: Creative Reality™ Studio enables users to generate AI-powered video avatars from a single image, creating engaging content in seconds.
D-ID’s API allows developers to integrate real-time video generation and conversational AI into applications for seamless user experiences.
Multilingual support enables avatars to speak in 120 languages, facilitating global reach for marketing and e-learning content.
Real-time conversational AI agents provide personalized, 24/7 customer service and support, enhancing user engagement.
Live Portrait feature animates still photos into speaking avatars, adding immersion to digital interactions.
Integration with platforms like Microsoft Teams, Canva, and Google Slides streamlines workflows for creating AI-driven presentations and videos.
Accessibility solutions offer real-time sign language translation and voice restoration for individuals with speech-limiting conditions.
High-security standards ensure data protection and compliance, safeguarding user privacy during video creation and interactions.

faqs.question: What is D-ID’s Creative Reality™ Studio?
faqs.answer: Creative Reality™ Studio is D-ID’s tool for transforming still images into speaking AI video avatars quickly, requiring no technical expertise.

faqs.question: Can D-ID’s avatars speak in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, D-ID supports video creation in over 120 languages, enabling global communication and localized content.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available for D-ID?
faqs.answer: D-ID offers a free plan with limited usage, allowing users to test core features before subscribing to premium plans.

faqs.question: How does D-ID ensure data security?
faqs.answer: D-ID adheres to high security standards with advanced technology and strict compliance protocols to protect user data.

faqs.question: What industries benefit from D-ID’s technology?
faqs.answer: D-ID serves marketing, sales, customer experience, and e-learning, creating engaging videos and AI agents for various use cases.

faqs.question: Can D-ID integrate with other platforms?
faqs.answer: Yes, D-ID’s API and integrations support platforms like Microsoft Teams, Canva, and Google Slides for seamless content creation.

faqs.question: How does D-ID support accessibility?
faqs.answer: D-ID provides real-time sign language translation and communication solutions for individuals with conditions like ALS, enhancing inclusivity.

faqs.question: What is the D-ID mobile app used for?
faqs.answer: The D-ID mobile app allows users to create AI videos with talking avatars on the go, ideal for quick, personalized content creation.
